timeline.bodyText: Should this file be deleted as well? I see the other classes in this project were.
timeline.author: pnicolucci

replies.bodyText: This fine has been modified. The line "return cl.getResource(path) == null;" creates a security warning, so I applied a java 2 security check around it.
replies.author: volosied
